<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofpr

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.90

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns [[true]] if engine is on, [[false]] if it is off.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[isEngineOn]] vehicle

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value>  vehicle: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_carEngineIsOn = [[isEngineOn]] _carOne;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[engineOn]], [[setCollisionLight]], [[isLightOn]], [[isCollisionLightOn]]
</value></part></template>

<dd class="notedate">Posted on March 20, 2015 - 14:32 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:RKillah|RKillah]]</dt>
<dd class="note">[[isEngineOn]] returns [[true]] for static objects without an engine
</dd>

<dd class="notedate">Posted on April 6, 2015 - 08:24 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Killzone Kid|Killzone Kid]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
Bind Engine action to User Action 1
<code>this [[addAction]] ["", 
{
	_this [[select]] 1 [[action]] 
	[
		["EngineOn", "EngineOff"] [[select]] [[isEngineOn]] (_this [[select]] 0), 
		_this [[select]] 0
	];
}, "", -10, [[false]], [[true]], "User1", "_this <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>==</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> [[driver]] _target"];</code>
</dd>
</dl>
